node.html:
Founded in 2016, United Vision Plan seeks to revolutionize the vision benefit plan industry by providing companies with the most affordable vision plans for their employees. UVP brings a fresh and clear digital approach to an industry rife with fine print and unexpected, out-of-pocket expenses. The company offers employees the opportunity to claim their eyewear from the comfort of their keyboard, ensuring that their eyewear is always up to date and accurate.

Vision benefit plans for the new economy.

The company addresses the workforce by providing employees with high quality prescription eyewear from a variety of over 4000 frames, setting it apart from most other companies in terms of variety, quality and cost.
